nodes.bodyText: Do we have anything to add to the change notes here? Changed assertions always raise an alert for me 🚨 ;) That said, why was is a struct before?
@gunnarmorling I am sorry but I took a liberty and merged. The changes are in the test code introduced in DBZ-2152 and was obviously copy and past of the original one
Ah, ok, so it was no existing assert. Yeah, all cool then. Thx!

What I find odd here is that the original PR with this test code passed Travis, so I didn't bother to run it locally (shame on me) to verify before rebasing & merging.  I understand why the test fails on master after the merging but why not prior during the PR phase is still weird.
